ab.head: William McLaughlin.
ab.p:
William McLaughlin, of Hornby, aged
80 years, died Saturday. Deceased was
one of the best known farmers in the
county, having been a veteran in the Civil
war, and was known as a great stock
raiser. The deceased is survived by a wife
and nine children as follows: James,
George, Charles, William, Daniel, Thomas
and Frank. Mrs. N.Ann Harrison and Mrs.
C. Hendricks. Six sons of the deceased
were pall bearers at their father’s funeral.
